definitions.text: include or contain; have as a component
examples: A totally new idea is comprised in this paper
The record contains many old songs from the 1930's

definitions.text: lessen the intensity of; temper; hold in restraint; hold or keep within limits
be capable of holding or containing
examples: This box won't take all the items

definitions.text: hold back, as of a danger or an enemy; check the expansion or influence of
examples: Check the growth of communism in South East Asia
Turn back the tide of communism
